BugInstance.message: Method org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.backend.mysql.connector.sane.MySQLSaneQueryResultEngine.getSaneQueryResult(SQLStatement, SQLException) uses instanceof on multiple types to arbitrate logic
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.backend.mysql.connector.sane.MySQLSaneQueryResultEngine.createQueryResult(SelectStatement) uses immediate execution of a block of code that is often not used
Static or private method org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.backend.mysql.connector.sane.MySQLSaneQueryResultEngine.createQueryResult(MySQLShowOtherStatement) has unused parameters
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.backend.mysql.handler.admin.MySQLAdminExecutorCreator.create(SQLStatementContext) uses instanceof on multiple types to arbitrate logic
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.backend.mysql.handler.admin.MySQLAdminExecutorCreator.create(SQLStatementContext, String, String) uses instanceof on multiple types to arbitrate logic
Unconstrained method org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.backend.mysql.handler.admin.executor.MySQLSetCharsetExecutor.parseCharset(String) converts checked exception to unchecked
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.backend.mysql.handler.admin.executor.MySQLSetCharsetExecutor.parseCharset(String) throws alternative exception from catch block without history

Method org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.backend.mysql.handler.admin.executor.NoResourceShowExecutor.lambda$getQueryResultMetaData$3(Object) appears to call the same method on the same object redundantly
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.backend.mysql.handler.admin.executor.ShowFunctionStatusExecutor.createQueryResultMetaData() excessively uses methods of another class
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.backend.mysql.handler.admin.executor.ShowProcedureStatusExecutor.createQueryResultMetaData() excessively uses methods of another class
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.backend.mysql.handler.admin.executor.ShowProcessListExecutor.createQueryResultMetaData() excessively uses methods of another class
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.backend.mysql.handler.admin.executor.ShowProcessListExecutor.getMemoryQueryResultDataRow(YamlExecuteProcessContext) excessively uses methods of another class
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.backend.mysql.handler.admin.executor.ShowTablesExecutor.getAllTableNames(String) buries logic to the right (indented) more than it needs to be
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.backend.mysql.handler.admin.executor.ShowTransactionExecutor.execute(ConnectionSession) makes literal string comparisons passing the literal as an argument

Method org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.backend.mysql.response.header.query.MySQLQueryHeaderBuilder.build(QueryResultMetaData, ShardingSphereDatabase, String, String, int) needlessly boxes a boolean constant
